channel.title: Help pimpscape coders
channel.description:
READ ALL PLEASE!
so i wanted to have interfaces like this: [img]http://img74.imageshack.us/img74/5307/sssfe6.png[/img] and i tryed very hard to copy from arbury but all my avail was what "Guard" standing next to the gate and arbury shared the same text,menus.but they had theire own faces.so in a later time i tried editing arburys to my liking and my npc. (guard) it was a succes but no arbury now lol.so i have new pimpscape server please explain how to add different of these interfaces.
BTW 90k rs gp and lots of mith arrows rs2 gp to the one who explains.

item.title: Help pimpscape coders
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thats a npc dialogue, you can use as example to make then, the cases and dialogs form the quest thats already with the source. The wizzard mizmog 1.

Read full topic
